TopicTitle: People having problem changing Resolution -- Have you Checked Your GPU Software Settings?

Articles.Content:
I'm running native 4k and was able to select it from the menu.

 

Fiddling around with my GPU software - I saw that KSP2 has 'optimization' options... and then I noticed the GPU wanted to downscale me for performance.

Did not want that.

 

I don't know if that is the issue for those with this problem - but it might be a place to start looking.  If the GPU software is limiting your options, the game might not offer the resolution you want.
